decks.notes: The primary objective of this deck is to utilize the Allosaurus Rider combo to quickly bring out powerful creatures such as Griselbrand and Xenagos, God of Revels. This combo involves casting Allosaurus Rider for free using the green mana from Nourishing Shoal, then sacrificing it to Neoform or Eldritch Evolution to fetch a huge creature from the deck. Consign to Memory can be used to protect the combo, while Planar Genesis can help ramp up mana quickly. The deck also includes various creatures and spells to support and complement the combo strategy.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while building up a strong board presence with aggressive creatures. By combining removal spells like Fatal Push and Prismatic Ending with disruptive creatures like Psychic Frog and Flickerwisp, the deck aims to control the battlefield and chip away at the opponent's life total. With cards like Overlord of the Balemurk and Empeor of Bones providing additional threats, the deck can quickly overwhelm the opponent. Meanwhile, cards like Relic of Progenitus and Thoughtseize help to disrupt the opponent's strategy and keep them off balance.

The deck focuses on controlling the board while quickly lowering your own life total to activate Death's Shadow's ability and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats. This aggressive strategy is supported by disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Counterspell, as well as removal like Fatal Push and Dismember. Additionally, cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Murktide Regent provide additional threats that can quickly close out the game. The deck aims to quickly apply pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan to secure a fast victory.
